aDO.text:
I am NOT a car guy, so this is just random stuff I am making up. These values will be subject to change

Each gear will have an auto max and manual max which will determine it's RPM

temperature is how hot the car needs to be to use this gear

acceleration = how fast velocity increases a second

manual max is when RPM will be in red, technically you can keep going, but the car WILL explode

gear | min | auto_max | manual_max | temperature | acceleration

N | 0 | 0 | 0 | x | 0
1 | 0 | 10 | 15 | x | 10
2 | 7 | 20 | 30 | x | 7
3 | 15 | 40 | 55 | x | 5
4 | 35 | 70 | 80 | x | 3
5 | 65 | 110 | 125 | x | 2
6 | 100 | 160 | 160 | x | 1

ITEM: bind - bind a key to a command

flag - modify an NPC flag or save flag
stat - modify a team member's stats
sysinfo - obtain information about your system
wrn_list: list all warnings during this session
